short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never forget to grease the groove!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Grease the groove (coined by Pavel Tsatsouline) is a training principle that allows you to get incredibly strong with minimal fatigue. Focus on 'practicing' strength (or movement, mobility or anything else) rather than 'working out'.

The challenge I had was to remember to GTG while engrossed in my work, so... Grease the new tab extension!

Also a way for me to test out Svelte JS.

A couple of things to note:

1. All data is kept locally on your browser, this extension does not collect anything from your computer. As such, clearing your browser history will also delete all your data - please be mindful of this.

2. The source code of this extension is open source - https://github.com/HemalR/grease - feel free to fork/contribute if you wish

Enjoy and please drop any feedback.
